title: Baş Belası
overview: This series is about the experiences of İpek Gümüşçü, a woman devoted to her family, when she started working as a psychologist in the police department as a result of the events that shook her life deeply. Ipek's detective interest, which has been her passion since childhood, will often bring her against the homicide bureau chief, Şahin Kara. "Baş Belası" will tell the fun stories of these two diametrically opposed characters, adorned with detective adventures.
